description: When attempting to install Windows 10 version 22H2, users may encounter repeated failures accompanied by the error code 0x80070003. This error typically indicates issues with file access during the installation process. In this case, the presence of Event ID 623 in the application log, specifically from the esent source, suggests potential corruption or problems with the transaction manager, possibly related to the application or system files being accessed. The current troubleshooting steps mentioned, including running DISM and SFC, are aimed at resolving system integrity issues that might be causing the installation failures. This issue is documented under KB5036892, pertinent for administrators working to maintain system stability and ensuring successful updates.
